examples.example: 我生日的时候收到了一块精致的手表，我非常喜欢。

translate.english: I received a delicate watch on my birthday and I like it very much.

examples.example: 他手腕上戴着的那块手表，见证了他无数奋斗的时光。

translate.english: The watch that he wears on his wrist has witnessed countless struggling times of his.

examples.example: 我送给爸爸一块手表作为生日礼物，他特别开心。

translate.english: I gave my father a watch as a birthday gift and he was extremely happy.
